events.name: North Korean ballistic missile launch
events.wd_description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.
events.description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.

events.name: Missile launch
events.wd_description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.
events.description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.

events.name: Regional response
events.wd_description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.
events.description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.

events.name: Suspension of BJP spokespersons
events.wd_description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.
events.description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.

events.name: Middle East protests
events.wd_description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.
events.description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.

events.name: BJP's initial reaction
events.wd_description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.
events.description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.

events.name: BJP's action
events.wd_description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.
events.description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.

events.name: Supporters' reaction
events.wd_description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.
events.description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.

events.name: Record-breaking heatwave in Japan, June 2022
events.wd_description: Japan is experiencing its worst heatwave since records began in 1875, with temperatures exceeding 35°C in Tokyo for five consecutive days and a record high of 40.2°C in Isesaki, leading to government warnings and health concerns.
events.description: Japan is experiencing its worst heatwave since records began in 1875, with temperatures exceeding 35°C in Tokyo for five consecutive days and a record high of 40.2°C in Isesaki, leading to government warnings and health concerns.

events.name: Heatwave impact in Tokyo
events.wd_description: Tokyo experienced temperatures exceeding 35°C for five consecutive days, marking the worst heatwave in June since records began in 1875.
events.description: Tokyo experienced temperatures exceeding 35°C for five consecutive days, marking the worst heatwave in June since records began in 1875.

events.name: Record temperatures in Isesaki
events.wd_description: Isesaki, northwest of Tokyo, recorded a temperature of 40.2°C, the highest ever recorded in June in Japan.
events.description: Isesaki, northwest of Tokyo, recorded a temperature of 40.2°C, the highest ever recorded in June in Japan.

events.name: Government response and health advisories
events.wd_description: The government issued warnings about potential power outages and advised citizens to use air conditioning to prevent heatstroke, as hospitalizations increased with the ongoing heatwave.
events.description: The government issued warnings about potential power outages and advised citizens to use air conditioning to prevent heatstroke, as hospitalizations increased with the ongoing heatwave.

events.name: Canada's investment in critical minerals for EV batteries
events.wd_label: Canada's investment in critical minerals for EV batteries
events.wd_description: Canada's federal budget will include an investment of at least C$2 billion to accelerate the production and processing of critical minerals needed for the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Canada's federal budget will include an investment of at least C$2 billion to accelerate the production and processing of critical minerals needed for the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Budget details and sources
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government will make the investment to ramp up extraction and processing of critical minerals, including nickel, lithium, cobalt, and magnesium.
events.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government will make the investment to ramp up extraction and processing of critical minerals, including nickel, lithium, cobalt, and magnesium.

events.name: Time frame and existing projects
events.wd_description: The investment could be spread over more than one year. Canada announced financial support for building two facilities and one battery gigafactory, but no agreements have been announced for mineral extraction or refining.
events.description: The investment could be spread over more than one year. Canada announced financial support for building two facilities and one battery gigafactory, but no agreements have been announced for mineral extraction or refining.

events.name: Minister's statement
events.wd_description: Natural Resources Minister Jonathan Wilkinson said potential projects need to be accelerated significantly, and that's the focus of the critical mineral strategy.
events.description: Natural Resources Minister Jonathan Wilkinson said potential projects need to be accelerated significantly, and that's the focus of the critical mineral strategy.

events.name: Finance ministry's response
events.wd_description: Canada's finance ministry declined to confirm whether the investment would be in the upcoming budget, but emphasized the potential for job creation and economic growth from critical mineral deposits.
events.description: Canada's finance ministry declined to confirm whether the investment would be in the upcoming budget, but emphasized the potential for job creation and economic growth from critical mineral deposits.

events.name: Government and company discussions
events.wd_description: There are active conversations between the Canadian government and companies on accelerating and scaling up the production of raw materials used in EV batteries.
events.description: There are active conversations between the Canadian government and companies on accelerating and scaling up the production of raw materials used in EV batteries.

events.name: Existing mining sector and green technologies fund
events.wd_label: Existing mining sector and green technologies fund
events.wd_description: Canada, with its large mining sector, has a multi-billion-dollar fund to invest in green technologies and is trying to attract companies involved in all levels of the EV supply chain.
events.description: Canada, with its large mining sector, has a multi-billion-dollar fund to invest in green technologies and is trying to attract companies involved in all levels of the EV supply chain.

events.name: Mineral extraction from mining waste
events.wd_description: Some projects being considered involve extracting critical minerals from tailings of existing mines, brines, and oil sands.
events.description: Some projects being considered involve extracting critical minerals from tailings of existing mines, brines, and oil sands.

events.name: Research and development needs
events.wd_description: Projects extracting minerals from mining waste require research and development to develop technologies that identify and separate critical minerals from the general waste stream.
events.description: Projects extracting minerals from mining waste require research and development to develop technologies that identify and separate critical minerals from the general waste stream.

events.name: GM's investment and partnerships
events.wd_description: GM is investing C$2 billion in two plants, including one producing an EV for commercial use, and has partnered with South Korea's POSCO Chemical to build a facility to make battery materials in Quebec.
events.description: GM is investing C$2 billion in two plants, including one producing an EV for commercial use, and has partnered with South Korea's POSCO Chemical to build a facility to make battery materials in Quebec.

events.name: Industry Minister's statement
events.wd_description: Canadian Industry Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne emphasized the need to ramp up mining and processing of critical minerals for EVs due to expected demand increase by 2050.
events.description: Canadian Industry Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne emphasized the need to ramp up mining and processing of critical minerals for EVs due to expected demand increase by 2050.

events.name: Global production and processing dominance
events.wd_description: Currently, Asia, particularly China, dominates global production and processing of critical minerals, rare earths, and rare metals for EVs.
events.description: Currently, Asia, particularly China, dominates global production and processing of critical minerals, rare earths, and rare metals for EVs.

events.name: Neo Performance Materials CEO's statement
events.wd_description: Constantine Karayannopoulos, CEO of Neo Performance Materials Inc, stated that Canada and North America need significant investment to catch up with China's dominance in the critical minerals space.
events.description: Constantine Karayannopoulos, CEO of Neo Performance Materials Inc, stated that Canada and North America need significant investment to catch up with China's dominance in the critical minerals space.
